lead_paragraph: Leicester City fans were treated to a doughnut and a free beer to celebrate their club chairman's birthday on Sunday but they could all be drinking champagne soon if they complete their remarkable fairytale and win the Premier League title.

headline.print_headline: Foxes' Fans Ready for Champagne After Doughnuts and Beer
headline.main: Foxes' Fans Ready for Champagne After Doughnuts and Beer

snippet: Leicester City fans were treated to a doughnut and a free beer to celebrate their club chairman's birthday on Sunday but they could all be drinking champagne soon if they complete their remarkable fairytale and win the Premier League title....
